Table of Contents

Class FluenceOfRhoAndZDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Z. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

public class FluenceOfRhoAndZDetector : Detector, IHistoryDetector, IDetector
